title: leaverbuster for no reason.
body: logged in today after school, got in, and got a message saying i am placed in lower priority queue for 1 game. last time i afked isnt even on my match history.  if any rioter sees this please help, i have no clue why this is.. if you can check my last leave i would love it cause i know it was a long time ago.. i didnt even leave any game for any amount of time and then returned any time lately. please help.

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems you have a recent trend of disconnections from matches within the last month. With that in your history, going AFK in a single game could have landed you in the LPQ track and could've caused this one match LPQ to pop up.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Same thing happened to me today. I have no record of leaving in my last 20 games. I doubt Riot will do anything about it though.


**UPDATE**
Just restarted my pvp client and re joined the queue. I am in the regular queue, one of my friends is also experiencing this bug.
